low.question: Who is the Hindu god of preservation in the Trimurti?

medium.question: Which avatar of Vishnu has a half-man, half-lion form who protected his devotee Prahlada?

hard.question: Which Vedic meter names the goddess Gayatri associated with the Rigvedic hymn of 24 syllables?
